ngiemboon: À paʼá túŋ tà á cʉ́ʼʉ lékẅíd mengʉ̀ŋe.
en: He wove the basket until all he needed was to reinforce the rim.
sp. plant used to make thread

ngiemboon: Nèm tʉ̌a na mekú tà é ne ńkyáŋte.
en: The sun shone on the bean so that it resonated.

ngiemboon: À naʼá ne ńkyáŋte na sɔ̌ɔn.
en: He's doing a bit of business.
